entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
